data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The skills that are crucial to being successful at a college or university include critical thinking and logical thinking. These skills are essential for a university student because knowledge at the university level requires students to debate and discuss so that they can have a better understanding of the subject. Such discussion and debate need critical thinking and logical thinking to help students engage in a meaningful learning process. Therefore, it is necessary for students to master these skills before they enter the university.
data.referenceText: Talk about the skills that are crucial to being successful at a college or university.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈谈在学院或大学取得成功的关键技能。
